text: Degraded CGN induced colon inflammation in rats .
Histograms showing the effect of degraded CGN on : colon length ( A ) ; macroscopic ( B ) and histological ( C ) inflammation score of colon ; Myeloperoxidase ( MPO ) activity ( D ) .
Control rats ( white bars ) ; 10 kDa degraded CGN-treated rats ( grey bars ) ; 40 kDa degraded CGN-treated rats ( black bars ) .
Histological analysis of colon from control rats ( E ) , and from 40 kDa dCGN-treated rats ( F ) .
